medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of abdominal pain with bilious vomiting and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced an acute onset of abdominal pain, accompanied by profuse vomiting and explosive diarrhea. Symptoms were significant enough to cause hypotension. No headache, chest pain, or shortness of breath reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV/AIDS, HCV, proximal femur fracture status post open reduction and internal fixation (ORIF).
